Title: Mercurial.Net
Description: .NET wrapper class library for the Mercurial Distributed Version Control System (DVCS) - (http://mercurial.selenic.com/), written in C# 3.0 for the .NET 3.5 Client Profile runtime.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
.NET wrapper class library for the Mercurial Distributed Version Control System (DVCS) - (http://mercurial.selenic.com/), written in C# 3.0 for the .NET 3.5 Client Profile runtime.

This class library implements a (almost) full wrapper for the Mercurial command line client, hg, as well as TortoiseHg GUI client.

Note that this is not an official library by the Mercurial/Selenic or TortoiseHg teams!

It is wholly my product, good or bad. Bugs/problems/whatever for Mercurial.Net should be filed here, and not with the Mercurial/Selenic teams.
logo used, and modified, with permission from Matt Mackall / Mercurial
